Key Match Events: A second-half own goal by Clement Mzize gave DR Congo a 1-0 victory over Tanzania
Post-Match Reflections: The result leaves Tanzania needing a positive result in their next match to keep their qualification hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo maintained their perfect record in Group H
The match was a tense affair, with Tanzania creating chances but failing to convert
Others: The match took place at Stade des Martyrs
